description: Monitors spark and EKS metrics using Prometheus in Kubernetes

panels.description:
The phase state timeline of all job pods (driver, executor(s) and job-runner)

If this graph looks convoluted, try selecting  less executors as it can only show so many pods at a time

targets.expr:
(
scalar(kube_pod_status_phase{pod="$Pod", phase="Failed"}*5) + 
scalar(kube_pod_status_phase{pod="$Pod", phase="Pending"}*3) + 
scalar(kube_pod_status_phase{pod="$Pod", phase="Running"}*2) + 
scalar(kube_pod_status_phase{pod="$Pod", phase="Succeeded"}*4) + scalar(kube_pod_status_phase{pod="$Pod", phase="Unknown"}*1)
)

panels.title: Phase State Timeline

targets.expr:
avg(1 - sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[5m]) ) by (cpu, node)) by (node)
and on (node) 
label_replace(kube_pod_info{node!="",created_by_name=~"$Pod"},"node","$1","node", "(.+)")

title: Spark - EMR On EKS
